animeTitle: Meitantei Holmes: Aoi Ruby no Maki / Kaitei no Zaihou no Maki
animeDescription: The famous blue ruby is stolen in such an elaborate way, that only one villain can be suspected - Professor Moriarty. It is up to Sherlock Holmes to return it and, in the process, to turn a young pick-pocket on the right path. In the second part, Moriarty sets his sights even higher, stealing a top-secret submarine from the Navy. What does he need it for? Holmes is once again on the trail.  (Source: BakaBT)
animeVoices: ['Shibata, Teruhiko', 'Otsuka, Chikao', 'Tomita, Kousei', 'Ichiryuusai, Harumi', 'Tanaka, Mayumi', 'Masuoka, Hiroshi']
animeStaff: [['Miyazaki Hayao', ['Director']], ['Utsunomiya Satoru', ['In-Between Animation']], ['Katayama Kazuyoshi', ['In-Between Animation']], ['Shinohara Nobuko', ['In-Between Animation']]]
